org.apache.flink.addons.hbase

类 HBaseRowInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichInputFormat<T,TableInputSplit>
      • org.apache.flink.addons.hbase.AbstractTableInputFormat<Row>
        • org.apache.flink.addons.hbase.HBaseRowInputFormat
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, InputFormat<Row,TableInputSplit>, ResultTypeQueryable<Row>, InputSplitSource<TableInputSplit>

    public class HBaseRowInputFormat
extends AbstractTableInputFormat<Row>
implements ResultTypeQueryable<Row>
    InputFormat subclass that wraps the access for HTables. Returns the result as Row
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 方法详细资料

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration parameters)
        从类复制的说明: AbstractTableInputFormat
        Creates a Scan object and opens the HTable connection.

        These are opened here because they are needed in the createInputSplits which is called before the openInputFormat method.

        The connection is opened in this method and closed in AbstractTableInputFormat.closeInputFormat().

        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 InputFormat<Row,TableInputSplit>
        指定者:
        configure 在类中 AbstractTableInputFormat<Row>
        参数:
        parameters - The configuration that is to be used
        另请参阅:
        Configuration

      • getScanner

        protected org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Scan getScanner()
        从类复制的说明: AbstractTableInputFormat
        Returns an instance of Scan that retrieves the required subset of records from the HBase table.
        指定者:
        getScanner 在类中 AbstractTableInputFormat<Row>
        返回:
        The appropriate instance of Scan for this use case.

      • getTableName

        public java.lang.String getTableName()
        从类复制的说明: AbstractTableInputFormat
        What table is to be read.

        Per instance of a TableInputFormat derivative only a single table name is possible.

        指定者:
        getTableName 在类中 AbstractTableInputFormat<Row>
        返回:
        The name of the table

      • mapResultToOutType

        protected Row mapResultToOutType(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result res)
        从类复制的说明: AbstractTableInputFormat
        HBase returns an instance of Result.

        This method maps the returned Result instance into the output type T.

        指定者:
        mapResultToOutType 在类中 AbstractTableInputFormat<Row>
        参数:
        res - The Result instance from HBase that needs to be converted
        返回:
        The appropriate instance of T that contains the data of Result.
